CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( AND( NOT( INCLUDES( BU__c, "Eur-Core" ) ) , NOT( INCLUDES( BU__c, "AMPE-Core" ) ) , NOT( INCLUDES( BU__c, "Eur-Impact" ) ) , NOT( INCLUDES( BU__c, "AMPE_Impact" ) ) ) , AND( INCLUDES( BU__c, "Asia-Core" ) , INCLUDES( BU__c, "Asia PE" ) ) )
, True , False )
CustomField.label: Include in Curated Pipeline Asia PE
